Reviews.Title: Canon Kit
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: After determining which camera I wanted I found your canon kit to be the best for the price. I compared between Canon and a Nikon. Nikon gave such good reviews of the T5i that I decided that was the one for me. Your kit gave me plenty of lenses and filters to practice and develop my skill to improve my abilities.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E8 + <6> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <11> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Tele/Wide Lenses + Accessory Kit
